detailDescription.1365:
About Intrepid Intrepid

Intrepid is a fast-growing and industry-leading ecommerce enabler, making sellers and brands successful in Ecommerce on all marketplace platforms across South East Asia through a combination of software solutions and value-added services across store management, online marketing, customer service (e.g. chat), data & intelligence, and fulfilment & logistics. Built by ex-Lazada founders and run by a young, enthusiastic and energetic team, Intrepid expanded to Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Vietnam, and Thailand in the span of 2 years.

Your Role & Impact

As Regional Senior Business Intelligence Developer based out of our office in Jakarta, you join a strong and international Business Intelligence team of over 6 data and BI enthusiasts with a regional scope in a fast growing company in the exciting SEA ecommerce industry. In this team, you will be responsible to evolve our BI & data management platform and solutions. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side backend logic and working with the rest of our BI team to ensure we have industry leading Business Intelligence capabilities. In this role you get exposure to all facets of ecommerce BI, tech, platform APIs and offers a steep learning curve for a business intelligence focused developer.

Your Responsibilities
Work together with our BI team and the rest of our technical engineers to continuously improve and implement our BI capabilities and solutions
Evolve and maintain the our data pipeline in production and ELT processes
Ensure a stable and high performing data warehouse
Write awesome code in Python and SQL - create quality, clean, solid, readable code that scales and performs well.
Drive continuous improvement by contributing to code reviews, documentation, and development process
Work with BI, business team, broader tech team, use data to solve problems, identify needs and opportunities
Identify potential problems, resolving code and data bottlenecks and troubleshoot system issues
Help drive accuracy and consistency in data and reporting
Train and provide support to users of BI reporting infrastructure


Qualifications
Strong technical background combined with analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilities
At least 3 years of work experience as developer
Having a sense to change manual process on the business side become automate.
Proven understanding about data warehouse concept & ETL process
Knowledgeable in eCommerce industry and thrives in a start-up working environment
Comfortable working with large data sets and numbers with strong grasp on numbers
Creative and innovative approach in solving problems
Self-starter and positive with a can-do attitude
Ability to work well independently and across various teams and multiple stakeholders
Interested in learning about new things and challenge the status quo to seek for improvement areas
Good verbal and written English communication skills and enjoys working in an international and diverse team

Your Ideal Tech Skill Set
Experience working with restful API, webhook API and Google API
Strong and hands-on experience with Python
Proficiency in RDBMS (MySQL/PostgreSQL)
Excellent programming and SQL skills
Experience working on GCP platform (Dataproc, Dataflow, BigQuery) is a plus
Experience with BigQuery, Hive, Hadoop, Spark data processing, experience of TB data processing experience is a plus
Familiar with server management (Windows-based) is a plus

Our Tech Stack
Python based
MYSQL
PostgreSQL
Dashboarding tools: Google datastudio, Power BI
Project Management tools: Jira & Asana
Server: Windows server (dedicated server)
Reporting tools: Metabase

What We Offer
Competitive salary package
Tech / developer position in a fast-growing international ecommerce company that has strong momentum and strong competitive differentiators (team, technology, regional footprint), this role offers an exciting growth journey, both on tech skill as well as professional development
You will work on tech aspects with leading ecommerce platforms and we serve leading ecommerce brands. You will get an understanding of tech aspects of all platforms and an overall understanding of South East Asia ecommerce ecosystem.
Ample opportunity for personal and professional development, both on the job (mentor) and through regular training (Ecommerce topics, soft skills and leadership training).
Multi-cultural environment, open, collaborative and fun culture in a diverse team

detailDescription.1373:
The Role

We are looking for an experienced, motivated, and creative Enterprise Account Manager to join our team in Jakarta (Indonesia). You will be reporting to the country manager for Indonesia and will be responsible for selling Nutanix’s products and solutions through channel partners and interacting directly with customers in the region. You will also work very closely with a Sales Engineer in the same field and territory.

About The Team

Our sales team at Nutanix is growing! We are a driven & passionate team of sales people with a desire to disrupt the current state of the datacentre. We are looking to expand our team to include additional A-players who are looking to bring simplicity and efficiency to a complicated world.

Requirements

Experience that demonstrates a strong level of expertise in technical specifications required to sell Nutanix products and services.
Possess an aptitude for understanding how technology products and solutions solve business problems, as well as the competitive landscape.
Possess strong RFP process knowledge to work closely with key prospects in the development of quotes using a consultative approach which includes; responding to RFP's and follow up with partners and customers.
Ability to work collaboratively with employees within the sales function, as well as cross-functional teams such as Marketing, Sales Operations, System Engineering, and Product Development.
Experience with target account selling, solution selling, and/or consultative sales techniques.
Ability to communicate with senior management about their business challenges and Nutanix data management storage solutions.
Experience with SFDC or other Customer Relationship Management tools.
Strong verbal and written communication skills, including presentation skills.

About You

You have a deep understanding of the Enterprise accounts (Telco preferred) in your territory and how the drive for simplicity, cloud-first strategies, and cost savings can be used to build positive relationships and deliver significant sales success.
You have a track record of exceeding assigned sales quotas in multiple, continuous years.
You are someone with an entrepreneurial spirit with an affinity for collaboration and teamwork.
You come with a keen ability to develop new accounts and penetrate new divisions and organizations within your assigned accounts.
You are extremely organized, with deep knowledge of account planning and strategy.
You have at least 8 years of field sales experience.
You have a Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience.

Does this sound like you? Let’s talk!

Note : This requisition is being used to build a pipeline for future recruiting needs

About Us

Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000+ employees worldwide. Our people (we call ourselves “Nutants”) are the heartbeat of #LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that makes Nutanix a great place to work at. We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession for our customers. We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit. Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique.
We are humbled to be recognized as one of Bloomberg’s Top 50 Companies to Watch in 2020 and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For® 2020 .
We’re growing fast and disrupting the computing industry. Join us and make your mark.

About Our Business

Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere. Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multi-cloud environments.

We’re an equal opportunity employer
Nutanix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and (in the U.S.) an Affirmative Action employer. Qualified applicants are considered for employment opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other category protected by applicable law. We hire and promote individuals solely on the basis of qualifications for the job to be filled.

We strive to foster an inclusive working environment that enables all our Nutants to be themselves and to do great work in a safe and welcoming environment, free of unlawful discrimination, intimidation

detailDescription.1376:
Are you a movement maker? Are you seeking new and exciting career opportunities?

Here is what you need to know about the job:


Responsibilities

Manajemen proyek / Project Management

1.1 Penanggung jawab bagi perusahaan secara teknis dan konsep untuk proses kerja dan jadwal pengembangan produk baru. Lead the conceptual and technical of company’s new product development workflow and timeline.

1.2 Mengawasi proses peluncuran produk, dari awal proses awal sampai dengan selesai produksi komersial. Oversee the product launch process, from project initiation to completion of commercialization.

1.3 Memperhatikan dan mengawasi kemajuan proses untuk memastikan tugas tugas di kerjakan sesuai waktunya oleh masing masing penanggung jawab. Track and monitor progress to ensure timely execution/delivery of key tasks/deliverables by those assigned.

1.4 Mengikuti rapat commercial dengan pelanggan untuk meemberikan dukungan dalam hal teknis terkait produk baru dan/atau inisiasi proyek terkait produk produk yang sudah ada. Join meeting with Commercial for technical support and directly contact with customer in related to NPD project and/or initiative project on the existing product(from existing customer).

1.5 Bertanggung jawab sebagai penghubung dalam proses komunikasi dengan departemen terkait dalam proyek. Serve as the stakeholders’ liaison and ensure timely communications occurs.

1.6 Mengikuti rapat setiap 2 minggu antar departemen untuk memberikan informasi proyek dan mengetahui apabila ada masalah dan bekerjasama untuk mencari solusi dari permasalahan tersebut. Join with bi weekly meeting cross-functional status meetings to discuss projects, identified issues/risks and collaborate on actions/solutions.

1.7 Mengumpulkan dan memberikan informasi yang jelas yang didapat dari berbagai sumber sebagai sumber referensi. Interpret and organize information from various sources into a clear and easy to reference summary.

1.8 Memastikan Kemasan yang digunakan mendapatkan persetujuan oleh pelanggan dan seusai dengan waktu di jadwalkan.

Ensure all packaging is routed and approved by stakeholders through project timelines .

1.9 Membuat dan mengatur jadwal proyek dan memastikan semua tim yang terlibat bertanggung jawab penuh terhadap tugas dan sebagai penghubung antar tim. Create and manage timelines, hold team members accountable to tasks, liaise with project stakeholders.

1.10 Bekerjasama dengan tim commercial, packaging development, sourcing, planning, finance, regulatory dan quality. Collaborate cross-functionally with commercial, Packaging Development, Sourcing, and Planning, finance, regulatory, Quality.

1.11 Memberikan penilaian terhadap suatu proyek dengan menggunakan Sistem, alat dan Teknik yang seusai. Measuring project performance using appropriate systems, tools and techniques.

1.12 Mengawasi proyek untuk memastikan tetap sesuai dengan proyeksi waktu dan biaya yang sesuai. Track the project health in term of on time and cost.

1.13 Membuat data evaluasi terhadapat proyek yang sudah selesai

Lead launch post-mortems and implement learnings.

1.14 Sebagai penanggungjawab untuk permintaan sampel dan formula.

Sample coordinator for packaging and formulations .

2 Lainnya / Other

2.1. Membuat dan mempertahankan hubungan yang baik dengan commercial, Quality, Operation dan I&D. Develop and maintain strong and reliable relationship with Commercial, QC, Operations and I&D.

2.2. Mengerjakan tugas tambahan lainnya yang di berikan oleh atasan langsung. Any reasonable additional duties requested or delegated by your line Manager.

Qualifications

Pendidikan dan Pengalaman / Education and Experience
Sarjana. Bachelor’s Degree
Berpengalaman dalam manajemen proyek. Experience in Project Management
Memahami pengembangan produk, peralatan produksi, quality assurance dan paham dengan GMP. Understanding of product development, manufacturing equipment, quality assurance and GMP are desirable.
Memiliki pengetahuan tentang fragrance/produk perawatan kulit dan juga produk kecantikan.
Technical knowledge in fragrance / skin care / cosmetic sindustry

Kriteria Yang Dipilih / Preferred Criteria
Memiliki motivasi tinggi, gesit dan juga bisa berkomunikasi dan bekerjasama dengan pihak lainnya. Highly motivated, agile, good at communicating and working with others.

If this sounds like you, Apply Now!

detailDescription.1377:
Company Description: Nityo Infotech is an information technology consulting company with its headquarters in Pittsburgh, USA and has a global presence spanning across USA, EMEA, APAC and India. Nityo is having operations in 17 countries with 27 offices across globe including US, Europe and Asia. At Nityo, our key focus is to empower our customers with customised business solutions through state of the art technology and best‐of‐breed business processes. Our portfolio of solutions and services includes infrastructure management services, outsourcing , system integration, Application Software development , IT consulting, IT Security Consulting , Cloud Computing, Data Science , Big Data Analytics , Artificial Intelligence, Industry specific products implementation & Support , Quality Assurance & Training. Nityo provides these services to several clients located across the globe, including many Fortune 1000 and Global 2000 companies, in the commercial, industrial and government sectors - across key vertical markets, like financial services, Manufacturing & Semiconductor, life sciences and healthcare, retail, telecommunications and utilities, Top notch System Integrator, and independent software vendors. Nityo has grown to become a global service provider of Infrastructure Management Services, Intellectual Property (IP) Leveraged Solutions, and IT Services, focused on the telecom, media, technology, manufacturing, power and healthcare industries. Our services span from Application Management Outsourcing, Packaged Application Services, Independent Validation, Verification and Testing, Product Development, and Support, to higher value‐added offerings including Managed Platform and Product Engineering Services. Job Description:
Design, code, and debug applications with minimal oversight and direction
Maintain application performance and collaborate with a cross-functional team to define design, and ship new features.
Incorporate user feedback to improve software design and function
Work closely with the product development team to design, develop, and published the product into
marketplace
Continually learn about new programming languages, operating system updates, and other information that will affect the functions of applications in development
detailDescription.1378:
Rich Products Corporation is a Multi-National Corporation (MNC) with over 11,000 associates worldwide and is a leading supplier in the foodservice, in-store bakery, retail and industrial marketplaces. We specialize in the manufacturing of an extensive array of delicious products to satisfy the appetite of customers in more than 100 countries and six continents and of it is Rich Products Indonesia.

Reporting directly to IT Manager, you will be responsible for manage IS infrastructure, application, and digital transformation for Rich Products Indonesia, both Offices and Plant. You will also be responsible to align with Global IS vision and digital transformation strategy, support Indonesia leaders to drive digital transformation in Indonesia's business to create a competitive advantage and enhanced customer experience. Contribute to the business goals of Indonesia business by assisting with the implementation and maintenance of information technology and service solutions that provide value to enhancing business effectiveness and efficiency. This will be an exciting challenge for you to learn and develop which will open the opportunity to accelerate your own career.


Some other responsibilities will include but are not limited to:
DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
Drive digital education/training and culture change in Indonesia business.
Identify digital opportunities to use digital technology effectively and efficiently in support of the business goals.
Support Indonesia business team digital activities
  PLANNING
Develop and maintain Indonesia IS strategic plans to ensure the IS department is in alignment with the Indonesia business and the Global IS strategy
Prepare annual information services operating plan and budget.
Be knowledgeable of business processes and how information technology and information system can enable and improve those business processes. 
 BUSINESS APPLICATION SUPPORT
 Coordination with Global/Regional II team to provide effective support to ERP/CRM and other application systems
Understand the needs of organization to define and document new digital opportunities and information system requirements.
Liaison between users, Richs SME’s, Regional IT support team and external consultants, coordinate testing, training for application project and change request.
Provide first level support on application systems
Coordinate and support E-Commerce platform development
  PROJECT MANAGEMENT
 Manage IT project implementations
Manage the work of both internal information services associates and external service providers.
Coordinate all projects with Global/Regional Rich Products Corporation IS to ensure integration, conformance to information technology architecture standards, resource availability, and priority.
 IS OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT
 Ensure that data, hardware, and software are always adequately secured.
Support day-to-day operations and resolve issues for hardware, software and telecommunications.
Coordinate computer systems upgrades with all concerned customers and vendors.
Ensure adequate technical support from vendors or information services. 
Monitor and control information technology projects within AOP and/or project funding levels.
Responsible for Indonesia network infrastructures
Provide the first line IT Help desk support to users for all hardware and software
Be responsible for purchasing IT equipment, software, PC, etc. in compliance with the headquarters’ standards

TRAINING AND DEVELOPMENT
 Inform non-IS associates of new features and functions of the applications by working closely with information services and software vendors. 
Facilitate training when necessary to ensure adequate skills are in place with the local associates.


REQUIREMENTS : 
Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
Required language(s): English (written and verbal)
At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
Minimum 3 years’ experience in Information systems/automation /manufacturing
Required Skill(s): Strong in Application Server, Digital Transformation, Hardware Maintenance, Software Programming, Microsoft Project, ERP, Network, Power BI, Data Management, Sharepoint
Strong Interpersonal and excellent communication skill
Excellent Project Management skill
Willing to travel to Office and Plant 
Preferably Staff (non-management & non-supervisor) specialized in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.

ONLY SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATES WILL BE CONTACTED.

You will find yourself working in a welcoming, family, and friendly performance culture where positive results are recognized and rewarded. Please apply to be part of this wonderful worldwide organization.

PT Rich Products Indonesia wishes to thank all prospective applicants for taking their time to apply for the role.

Genie (official website: https://genie.shop/ ）

It is a SaaS platform focusing on business services in the Asia Pacific region. It aims to provide complete multi-channel, multi-scene, and digital solutions for businesses through AI and Internet technology. Since its launch in February 2020, the genie has reached cooperation with major mainstream platforms in the Asia Pacific region, serving more than 20000 customers. Genie is also a member of the advanced intelligence group (official website: https://advanceigroup.com/en-US ）Genie, established in Singapore in November 2019, enjoys group resources, and develops independently and rapidly. So far, the genie has set up independent offices in Beijing, Singapore, Jakarta, and Ho Chi Minh City with 100 + team members.

detailDescription.1382:
Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

Responsibilities
Win, retain, and develop business accounts via sales hunting activities
Growa ndmaximize revenues generated from each account by building rapport and trust with customers and being informed about their business needs. Act as trusted consultant for key accounts
Support customer retention through collaboration with sales, operations and business intelligence team to resolve issues faced by customers

Requirements
3 - 5 years in a high-pressure sales environment with a proven track record of exceeding assigned sales quotas.
Bachelor's degree from a reputable university
Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia
Proficient with Microsoft Excel
English literacy a strong pluspoint
Ability to effectively communicate and manage relationships with senior stakeholders at organizations
Experience in logistics, E-Commerce, B2B sales will be considered as a plus point

Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

Sales Planning Manager is a resource for supporting volume growth – play an important role in shaping direction.

Sales Planning Manager is responsible for EXECUTING THE SALES SYSTEM: providing tools, data, information, knowledge, guidelines, and vigilance/compliance across FS sales channels.

This responsibility demands the Sales Planning Manager to be updated and hands-on with:
Day to day sales management practices
Procedures across processes, systems/tools
Improve Sales Effectiveness and Efficiency
Knowledge and awareness levels of sales team to provide support.

Key Accountabilities
Sales Management:
Provide Business Performance Reporting (Daily / Weekly / Monthly)
Provide effective consultancy and advisory support to Sales head to analyze, plan, and implement necessary sales plans and resources to achieve volume requirements.
Cross functional topics
Sales calendar: meetings, initiatives

Sales Planning
Provide support for Budgeting and Planning exercise
Design and implement Incentive scheme in line with Regional guideline.
Play pivotal role in Month Business Review (MBR) process:
Review deck ready on time
Country comments updated.
Follow up on Action plan.
Implementation and monitoring of the sales processes, coaching and Performance improvement framework and applications in the countries.
Review post-implementation performance in the countries to ensure sales management process, sales coaching, Sales Performance, and tools/automation usage are further developed and directly stimulating growth of business.

Sales Development
Integrate the Regional Sales Process, Sales Stimulation Initiative, Best in Class Sales Skills, and Saleforce.com usage to ensure its usage as part of daily sales activity.
Lead country sales audits/reviews to ensure countries are compliant with regional sales priorities and process.
Data Quality: To ensure correct set up as well as awareness by salesperson to capture information in the correct manner in Sales tools (e.g., Salesforce.com)
Provide information to sales and sales teams to continuously monitor input & output measures for desired result.
Customer re-allocation (Rank up & Rank Down): Lead and provide support in customer allocation exercise to ensure customers in the right channel.
Salesforce.com Admin Support: Support Sales team on day-to-day salesfore.com admin activities:
Customer owner transfer:
Bulk upload of Leads (from all source)
New user ID creation ticket
User Deactivation ticket

People / Sales Training
Initiate and develop working partnerships with Regional and Local Sales training team to assist the FS Channel to develop training requirement.
Ensure All planned training delivery on time and serve the purpose.
Work with local sales trainer on post-training activities (e.g., Survey, Assessment etc.)
Manage direct reports in completing Sales Operation, project plans and delivering reports in timely fashion. (Local Sales Operation person).

Key Requirements
Experience Required:
Minimum 3-5 years proven experience in a commercial / Sales Support role
Proven track record of project management experience.
Excellent understanding of Sales processes and ideally a background in actual selling
Hands- on knowledge of Customer Relationship Mgmt. (Salesforce.com) & Business Intelligence systems,
Experience in managing a team.
Experience in logistics is a plus.
Previous experience in Country and Regional office collaborates environment will be added advantage

Education / Qualifications:
Minimum requirement: Bachelor’s degree; preferably master’s degree

Skills:
Creative and analytical thinker with strong problem-solving skills
Must demonstrate exceptional verbal and written communication skills.
Must demonstrate ability to communicate effectively at all levels of the organization.
Ability to critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs.
Ability to assess the impact of new requirements on Salesforce.com and all upstream and downstream applications, systems, and processes.
High level of comfort with data analysis and interpretation

detailDescription.1387:
Job Description
Product Manager will use a combination of outstanding analytical skills, business judgment, and strategic thinking to innovate and build world-class experiences that will impact students and parents lives. We are looking for a self-driven and passionate product manager to join us in leading the Financial products charter.
Product Manager who will play a key role in building a financial product strategy, to transform the way the Finance organization derives value from applications, business intelligence, analysis and automation. You will be joining an Engineering and Product group responsible for defining and building the financial platforms and applications that will help accelerate the growth for Pintek.id
The individual in this role will work closely with other Product Managers in the product area, business stakeholders and partners, with a goal of understanding the interoperability of data and products throughout the financial ecosystem and analysis workstreams. There will additionally be a large focus on how to create a value-add experience for end users as it relates to Lending products.
We are looking rockstars who are passionate about building tech products that customers love. You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and work with cross-functional teams to design, build and roll-out products that deliver the company’s vision and strategy.
Creating buy-in for the product vision both internally and with key external partners
Developing product roadmap and Go-to-market strategies
Managing product led growth on the basis of data analytics besides ensuring product operation and adoption
Managing and delivering projects by working closely with other Product Managers and Tech Team, also mentoring them.
Translating product strategy into detailed product features and requirements/prototypes
Work closely with designer and tech teams to ensure timely release of products


Job Requirements
Proven ability to develop product and marketing strategies and effectively communicate recommendations to executive management
Solid understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and web technologies
Experience or exposure to gamification frameworks and understanding of key product metrics.
Open-minded and able to adapt product development approach to achieve fast and effective outcomes, have the ability to move quickly between and/or combine Agile and Waterfall methodologies
Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to roll up one’s sleeves to get the job done
Experience in working with data and analytics platforms such as mixpanel, clevertap, google analytics, Adobe Analytics etc is a MUST
Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams in a matrix organization
Excellent communication, problem-solving, and analytical skills
English Speaking skills is a MUST
Strong people orientation is desired to build a cohesive strong product leadership in the middle layer
detailDescription.1388:
Main Competencies Requirements
We are looking for a SAAS Enterprise Account Manager to play a critical role in building relationships with significant clients. Our ideal candidate should ensure client satisfaction and be able to identify new opportunities to increase revenue.
As an Enterprise account manager, you will represent company and interact with major clients. So, if you have excellent communication skills with a customer service attitude, we would like to meet you.

The Key Responsibilities
To exceed monthly / quarterly sales targets by selling SAAS Products into enterprise accounts and within an assigned geographical or vertical market. You will manage the entire sales process to ensure delivery against key performance metrics, with a strong emphasis on new business sales, while expanding existing accounts.
Territory identification and research, to formalize a go to market territory strategy and create a qualified target account list within 30 days.
Pipeline development through a combination of cold calling, email campaigns and market sector knowledge/intelligence.
Create and maintain a sales pipeline to ensure over-achievement within the designated market sector(s).
Engage with prospect organizations to position SAAS solutions through strategic value based selling, business case definition, ROI analysis, references and analyst data.Manage the end to end sales process through engagement of appropriate resources such as Sales Engineers, Professional Services, Executives, Partners etc.
Generate short term results whilst maintaining a long term perspective to maximize overall revenue generation.
Daily update of the Salesforce system with accurate customer and pipeline data.
Accurate monthly forecasting and revenue delivery.

Required Skills
Successfully sold into large Enterprise companies.
3 - 6+ years of enterprise solution sales experience selling Enterprise sales.
A proven track record of driving and closing enterprise deals.
Consistent overachievement of quota and revenue goal.
Required language(s): English (Fluent).

Desired Skills
Strategic account planning and execution skills.
Experience selling to C-Level and across both IT and business units to customers in Indonesia.
Strong technical aptitude.
Passion and commitment for customer success.
Ability to sell both an application and deployment of a platform.
Strong time management skills.
Proven consultative sales solution skills, including the ability to articulate a clear, concise return on investment value statement.Ability to maintain a high level of productivity, manage multiple competing priorities, and work effectively under the pressure of time constraints in a fast-paced, complex, collaborative, and team-oriented environment.

The Job: Senior Integrations Developer

Pay rate: $20-30 per hour

***Salesforce APEX experience, a PLUS***

You will be a key member of the Agiloft engineering team responsible for delivering data integration projects.

The Senior Integrations Developer designs and implements the data integration of disparate systems and builds extensible data acquisition and integration solutions to meet the functional and non-functional requirements of the business. In this role the Integrations Developer implements processes and logic to extract, transform, and distribute data across one or more data stores from a wide variety of sources.

The Senior Integrations Developer provides problem-solving expertise and complex analysis of data to develop business intelligence integration designs with stakeholders in Agiloft or in customer projects and to translate functional specifications into technical designs for implementation and deployment, The Senior Integrations Developer develops and maintains data integration standards according to Agiloft’s information services policies as well as best practices, conducts reviews of other integration developers’ development efforts to ensure consistent methodologies are followed and to make recommendations where necessary.

You should have no less than three years of professional experience in building enterprise-grade applications with a focus on integrations and API and one year plus experience with Apex applications.

The ideal candidate is passionate about building software and must be comfortable with setting their own schedule and proactively collaborating in a globally dispersed team using a variety of communication channels. This is a remote-only position.

Job Responsibilities
Manage data analysis and data integration of disparate systems
Build extensible data integration solutions to meet the functional and non-functional requirements of the business
Implement processes and logic to extract, transform, and distribute data across one or more data stores from a wide variety of sources
Optimize the data integration platform to provide optimal performance under increasing data volumes
Provide problem-solving expertise and complex analysis of data to develop business intelligence integration designs
Develop and maintain data integration standards
Work with project stakeholders to translate functional specifications into technical designs for implementation and deployment
Ensure high quality and optimum performance of data integration systems in order to meet business solutions
Follow company guidelines for programming and documentation
Mentor Junior Integration Developers

Job Requirements
Minimum 3years of experience as Software Developer
Java Developer
Web Services (REST & SOAP)
RESTful API design and JSON data representation
Experience with J2EE, Tomcat, JBoss
Experience in Multi-threading is a plus
Relational database
Experience working in geographically dispersed teams
Bachelor’s Degree

Preferred Qualifications
Good understanding of current database technologies and their applications
Experience with Salesforce Apex a plus
A keen interest to learn about new technologies
Fluent in the English language

About Agiloft
Agiloft was named as the market leader in every category in the Gartner Critical Capabilities for CLM report, and a market leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant. Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) is one of the fastest-growing areas of enterprise sales, with a TAM projected to climb from $2B to $7B in the next 5 years.
The Agiloft Contract and Commerce Lifecycle Platform has won over a dozen awards, including the Editor's Choice award from PC Mag, for the past five years in a row.
Agiloft has a highly differentiated value proposition which is uniquely appealing to enterprises: pre-built applications with a deeply configurable, no-code platform for integrated Business Process Management throughout an organization.
Agiloft is pioneering the applied use of Artificial Intelligence to enable next-generation business commerce at organizations ranging from small enterprises to U.S. government agencies and Fortune 100 companies.
Agiloft is the only company in the industry with the confidence to provide an unconditional satisfaction guarantee, and you too will be successful with Agiloft.

As the leader in the CCLM market, Agiloft is winning many Enterprise deals and looking to hire the best talent to meet this demand with a competitive compensation plan that rewards overachievement.

Our Values: Honesty, Integrity, and Respect | Accountability | Client Focus | Continuous Improvement

detailDescription.1392:
Location

Bogor, Indonesia

Description

PTHI is seeking a skilled environmental professional to join our natural resources team at PTHI to help us build a sustainable future for our company and country. Your passion and expertise are essential to help grow our business, and we are offering an attractive opportunity to be part of a company that interacts across a wide range of sectors and clients, in Indonesia and internationally. The Senior Forestry Specialist will be part of the business development and management of a diversified company that is looking to expand into new markets.

PTHI recognizes the importance of a balanced approach to work. Along with rewarding professional development opportunities and a competitive salary, careers at PTHI come with benefits that help you grow within the company and contribute to the wider community.

The right candidate will be able to demonstrate experience in the environmental and natural resources management sector, as well as the ability to work with and manage a diverse team of national and international specialists as you work with national and international clients and standards. In addition, you possess the ability to develop business within your network, along our existing lines of business, and pursue new lines of work that align with our vision and mission as a company. Overall, the ideal candidate shares our desire to grow the capability of our team to support our clients.

Responsibilities

Role and Responsibilities
Lead multi-disciplinary teams to undertake projects related to sustainable forest management, climate change initiatives, forest policy and regulations, sustainable forest management, forest financing in Indonesia and in compliance with national and international standards.
Coordinate and implement field assessments related to biodiversity, forest carbon, permanent forest plots, forest and oil palm certification, and land rehabilitation.
Manage project team activities including preparation of project work plans, schedules, budgets, technical activities, and coordination of technical staff and sub-consultants to ensure efficient use of corporate resources, preparation and editing of documents (proposals, reports, and geomatic outputs)
Ensure QA/QC on project outputs to ensure the highest possible standards, and any additional tasks required to ensure that project outputs are completed on time, on budget and to acceptable corporate standards.
Provide leadership in the implementation of company QHSE systems and policies.
Provide mentorship and guidance with team members to provide a dynamic work environment and develop a career path to meet team members’ and company goals.
Lead marketing and business development activities in the environmental sector in Indonesia and southeast Asia with private and public sector clients, as well as international developmentalorganizations. This will include: strengthening corporate relationships with existing clients; marketing and business development with potential clients; providing business intelligence for overall corporate marketing activities; remaining proficient with the direction and status of industry projects and opportunities; and providing assistance in the preparation of proposals and proposal negotiations with clients.


Competencies

Education and Experience:
Competency and familiarity with forestry and natural resources management issues in Indonesia, including biodiversity, REDD+, sustainable forest management, sustainable resources management and community livelihood/community development.
Excellent analytic and research skills (leveraging a sound knowledge of scientific literature).
Experience with designing and implementing scientific studies/field programs and managing field teams and the collection baseline data.
Comprehensive knowledge of environmental (impact) assessment and an understanding of how effects of project-related developments on forestry and other natural resource values should be investigated and reported.
Experience with preparing regulatory applications for approvals and possess a sound working knowledge of national and provincial environmental legislation.
Experience operating in a dynamic consulting environment that requires flexibility and teamwork; and an ability/interest to work in the field, occasionally in remote locations for extended periods of time.
Working knowledge of Indonesian regulations and international standards including International Finance Corporation (IFC) Performance Standards and Equator Principles related to natural resources and forestry.
Posses strong leadership, team management, and good interpersonal skills.
Ability to support business development and marketing activities using modern networking skills and able to leverage an existing network in the private sector, government, nongovernmental organizations and/or universities to develop new business opportunities.
Confident to undertake negotiation and mediation with senior decision makers, both internally and externally.
Strong spoken and written communication skills in both Bahasa Indonesia and English.
Proficiency with forest and oil palm certification schemes will be an advantage.
GIS and remote sensing skills will be advantageous.


Education And Experience
M.Sc. in forestry or environmental management relevant fields, or equivalent post-secondary education.
Minimum of 10 years’ experience in forestry or natural resources management projects with a demonstrable track record of increasing responsibilities.
Experience leading multi-disciplinary technical and non-technical experts or teams.
Experience implementing projects under international standards and safeguards, i.e., IFC, World Bank, ADB, etc.
Experience providing mentorship to technical and non-technical team members.

To apply, please submit a cover letter and resume describing your experience and salary expectations through email to: ******** (no phone calls please). Please include “Senior Forestry Specialist” in your email subject line. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. Please submit only via email and not through the online submission “Apply Now” form.

You will be a key leader within CVS Health’s PSS Finance organization providing direct support to the Finance organization as we continue to enhance and expand the reporting and analytics capabilities within the PSS Finance organization. Masters / MBA

detailDescription.1396:
The Area Finance Business Partner is a sparring partner and trusted business advisor to the Product Manager to achieve strategic growth objectives. This person will take an active role in performance management and in driving action plans for improving L&S (Logistics & Services) product performance across area geographic coverage. Based on standard MOS data, he/she will act as a facilitator to analyze and challenge performance, ensure shortfalls in performance and opportunities for high performance are uncovered and that robust benefit tracking is in place. He/She will also work closely with Region FBPs (Finance Business Partners) and colleagues from other Areas thereby ensuring that best practices are shared and applied in order to constantly raise the bar for value adding Finance Business Partnering and ensure decision making is based on robust data and is underpinned by logical assumptions.

This is an exciting career opportunity to work in a multinational, Global 500 company that makes global trade happen. You will be interacting daily with colleagues internationally, giving you the opportunity to develop your professional skills in a global environment. We provide support for you to shape your own career by achieving expertise and learning on the job.

We offer

A position in a fast-moving and constantly developing cluster function with exposures to all functions within and across the Indonesia and Philippines area.
Opportunity to sharpen analytical and partnering skills as well as problem solving techniques
A challenging job with a steep learning curve in a truly international and diverse working environment
Opportunities for personal and professional growth
Value and team based leadership
An open and engaging company culture
A wide range of international career opportunities

Key responsibilities

Based on standard performance cycle, deliver performance transparency utilizing the latest BI landscape, and Market intel sources
Build forecast & scenario based simulations & business cases for decision making
Weekly product performance reporting for area-wide broadcast
Monthly Profit & Loss analysis for products managers
Work closely with cost controllers and Business Controllers to deliver a monthly cost analysis for product managers
Business case and Financial model building & sparring with product managers (e.g. discounted cash flow analysis; NPV, IRR etc)
Run initiatives and projects together with the business; monitor the progress which leads back to performance transparency
Contribution in Product FBP community in Asia Pacific Region for best practice sharing & capability development of the community
Engagement in projects & other focal roles; e.g. Maersk Operating System focal for the Area accurately.

We are looking for

A solid financial educational background as Chartered Accountant or equivalent Master’s degree in Business and/or Finance
Financial acumen: Understanding & telling stories based on Profit & Loss, Building Business case & Financial/investment model for decision making
Problem solving: Quickly capturing what business requires, providing relevant insights based on the best data available for decision making. Decomposing a complex problem into manageable pieces
Stakeholder management: Engaging with senior leaders, managing expectations and speaking-up & influencing without authority
Communication & presentation: Presenting in front of senior leaders & decision makers and getting your point come across in English
Microsoft Office suites: Advanced PowerPoint & Excel
Business acumen: Understanding of Logistics & Services business
As a performance-oriented company, we strive to always recruit the best person for the job – regardless of gender, age, nationality, sexual orientation or religious beliefs. We are proud of our diversity and see it as a genuine source of strength for building high performing teams.

We believe that by bringing everyone together, we can solve problems using innovative technology that can create a world that is sustainable and secure. At NTT, we encourage you to remain continuously curious, as that is what keeps you fast, flexible and relevant. No two days will be the same but that is what will help you grow and realize your full potential. The power is in your hands to do great things. It’s time to lead the change, be the authentic you, to solve difficult challenges, to set the pace of change and to unleash your potential. Want to be a part of our team?The primary objective of the Sales Specialist (Hunter): Assigned Account (NTT) is to promote technology domain-focused solutions within a practice or service area to drive expansion within assigned accounts in segments 1 and 2. This is done in such a way that is accessible by different stakeholders with different levels of technical expertise. They demonstrate NTT Ltd’s capability and experience in the relevant practice area or service area – resulting in the expansion of existing client accounts. They are specialists in a specific practice area or service area and will work on an assigned account. The Sales Specialist (Hunter): Assigned Account (NTT) displays an excellent level of industry knowledge, combined with commercial acumen, business strategy skills, and knowledge of sourcing models and market trends as well as in-depth understanding of the client’s business. This role is able to generate demand by assisting clients to identify and qualify current needs. They effectively articulate how NTT Ltd can add value through its products and services solutions offerings. Responsible for new account development and/or expanding existing accounts within an established geographic territory/product line. Working at NTT Primary Segment Focus Existing clients Secondary Segment Focus New clients Sales Process Involvement Expand Client Load Existing: 15 – 30 Prospect: 0 Sales Time Allocation Pre-sales: 30% Engaged selling time: 35% Sales completion: 20% Sales facilitation: 15% Solution Focus Primary: Specialist in one of the following areas: CX and Digital Workplace, Digital Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, Digital Business Solutions, Services Sales Strategy with Buyers & Products Existing: Penetration (new/different products) Key Roles and Responsibilities: Promote technology domain-focused solutions within a practice area or service area to drive expansion within assigned accounts in segments 1 and 2. Generate demand by assisting clients to identify and qualify current needs Effectively articulate how NTT Ltd can add value through its products and services solutions offerings. Work closely with paired strategic client managers. Conduct business conversations with the client that are solution usage and results orientated, focusing on why the offering is needed and how it can be used to meet the client’s needs. Prospect for new opportunities within an account and engage in business development activities that lead to new business opportunities for NTT Ltd. Participate in the negotiation of deals with clients and lead the internal account management team to enable conclusion of the deal. Deepen relationships with domain-specific client key stakeholders and vendors, building new relationships and deepening solution knowledge. Contribute to the knowledge base of NTT Ltd’s solutions and services within a practice area or service area by sharing best practices with clients Use understanding of the client’s business and depth of knowledge on the technology-specific solution to personalise the recommended solution in line with the client’s need. Achieve sales targets and assigned strategic account objectives. Generate revenue and reach sales targets for a specified solution. Contribute to the pre-sales process by working with Architects to create the best solution design for the client. Realise revenue and margin targets and exploit opportunities, whilst displaying notable client service orientation. Use probing questions and a conversational approach to explore and uncover the client’s needs. Evaluate and consider opportunities as a potential buy and are able to discern when to withdraw from the sales engagement and when to pursue it. Co-ordinate efficient product and services offerings deployments. Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Sales business acumen – the skills supporting successful selling through organizational and business outcome mindset. Success will require focusing on planning, leveraging tools and data, and concentrating on NTT Ltd business requirements. Developing the skills to understand your client’s business (including commercial and financial aspects) in order to bring value to them from NTT’s portfolio of services. Sales client engagement & management – the skills used to effectively manage and analyze the client throughout the client lifecycle, with the goal of improving client relationships and driving sales growth. Success will require detailed understanding of client needs, effective sales planning, and building trust, all while managing to client expectations. Developing the skills required to know your client, building effective & lasting relationships with them and to be seen as a trusted advisor. Sales solution skills – the knowledge of NTT Ltd’s offerings, client applications, use cases and market trends and the skill to apply them to individual client and prospect situations that positions the sales team member as an expert client advisor. Success will require the ability to link NTT ltd offerings, including high-value services to specific client and prospect needs and outcomes Sales resources optimisation – building internal relationships, working with pursuit teams and leveraging vendors as resources throughout the sales cycle. Sales pursuit – the skills and knowledge that enable a sales team member to create success by identifying and advancing opportunities at assigned prospects and clients. Success will require both individual ownership as well as accountability for coordinating internal and external resources in order to close sales opportunities. Sales strategy execution – the skills to ensure that the sales strategy is aligned to the business strategy. Sales business management – the skills to ensure that target setting, and associated processes is aligned to meeting the target. Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Relevant Degree Relevant vendor certifications would be advantageous Required Experience: Demonstrable sales account management experience working in a large IT Company Experience in specialist (focus area) products and understanding of industry best practices Demonstrated experience in working closely with a variety of relevant vendors Proven sales and client engagement experience Demonstrated business development experience with requisite understanding of relevant markets and market penetration strategies What will make you a good fit for the role?Standard career level descriptor for job level:

detailDescription.1399:
About The Challenge

Taking growth to the next level. As a head of growth, you will be responsible for leading, nurturing and growing the unpaid traffic acquisition for the business through strong SEO, increase in app installs/usage, improved Email/Alerts/Push notifications/other communication campaigns. Furthermore, leading a team of specialists to achieve the assigned goals and KPIs, as well as fostering cross-department/function collaboration.

About Lamudi

Lamudi Group is an online real estate marketplace with active operations penetrating the majority of the market in Mexico, Philippines and Indonesia. We were founded in 2014 and recently acquired by an established investor in the real estate industry, EMPG. Lamudi has been pushing boundaries in the PropTech space and is looking at dominating the Asian market with new products and services that will service the growing need in the real estate business.

Key Responsibilities
App growth: Increasing the App’s user acquisition by increasing the # of installs and improving the app rankings through app store optimization.
App growth: Understanding and studying the user funnel journey and working with cross-functional teams to shift the users from Web to App.
SEO growth: Ensuring the continuous increase of the SEO rankings & visibility in the respectful markets by understanding what and when to optimize.
Technical SEO: you will be responsible for optimizing the Technical SEO performance of the websites in very close coordination with developers. That will require a deep understanding of ALL the technical seo topics incl. (Indexation, Canonicalization, XML sitemaps, SEO JS, impact on technologies like Ajax, etc. on SEO, internal-linking automations, log files analysis, website full-crawls, etc..)
CLM (Customer-life-cycle management): Maximize customer life-time value through communication across channels (on-site, CRM,..) and workout & test respective product improvements
Managing teams: leading a team of SEO specialists, you will be responsible for identifying areas of organic growth, motivating and encouraging the team and ensuring proper execution to meet the defined KPIs. Part of the responsibility is to create a culture of learning and developing the team skills’ further.
Cross-Functional work: you will be working a lot with different teams incl. Paid Marketing, Business Intelligence and Engineering to drive a holistic SEO roadmap and ensuring smooth execution.
Reportings/Benchmarking: you will be responsible for communicating and creating actionable dashboards that show all aspects of the performance (SEO technical performance, On-page/Off-page performance, App performance) and communicate this with the respective stakeholders.
Advanced-level Analysis: you will be responsible for driving regular advanced-level analysis with the SEO team (potential areas where we can further improve 5x more)

Is this you?
5+ years of experience in similar relevant role (SEO Lead/head of SEO/Marketing lead)
Advanced level of understanding and experience (3-4+ years) in the technical SEO area (html, js, css, xml, ajax, server-side/client-side rendering, etc..)
Python and SQL is a big plus, especially python
Data-driven person that loves to conduct regular in-depth analysis to unveil further areas of improvement
Advance use & understanding of relevant tools like any/all of following (GA/GSC, Screaming frog, Oncrawl/deepcrawl/botify, Moz, Semrush, ahrefs, Firebase)
Experience leading teams before, preferably 4-5+ members
Very good communication skills (verbal & written), able to create an easy-to-follow/clear action-items from a complex analysis
Proven track record of successful unpaid traffic-acquisition strategies and campaigns from previous jobs

We offer significant learning and growth opportunities in a fast-scaling, successful internet business.

We work with experienced and highly entrepreneurial colleagues who's focus shall be to help you grow.

We provide a very attractive work environment in the heart of Makati's business area

We are proud of our highly dynamic, young, motivated, and international team with flat hierarchies.

If you want to become a part of our highly motivated, successfully thriving, international team, send us your application! We look forward to hearing from you!

detailDescription.1401:
Our Mission

At Glints, we are building The #1 full-stack tech-enabled career development and human resource ecosystem in Greater Southeast Asia. Our product offering spans across early career discovery, continuous skills development, and tech-enabled local and cross border recruitment.

Glints’ Growth Story by Numbers We used a tech-enabled approach to connect 1 Million+ candidates to their next dream opportunities, supported 30,000+ companies find great talent, achieved double-digit enhancements in recruiter efficiency, and raised US$10M+ from the best venture investors in Asia. We’re on the look for a Client Success Manager to join our Sales team to help grow that mission in Asia.

How You Can Make Greater Impacts Client Success Manager will drive the customer success and customer experience function across TalentHunt, build interactions with customers, solve their problems and needs. She/he will also encourage the customer to get the best from what we offer and think of ways to improve and systematize customer experience.

What You'll Be Doing Lead a team consist of up to 4 Account Managers and drive the team to meet the company’s strategic objectives in terms of sales, profit, and growth target. Manage client retention rates, job renewal (farming), and upselling different products line to clients. Manage long term partnerships and provide outstanding service to the client on commercial and rally for differentiated support from the larger organization. Identify the client's value chain and ultimately create value map strategies for own set of customers. Work to perform in analyzing Glints customers' satisfaction and needs, which may open up new opportunities for cooperation. As a Consultant for our hiring partners, providing the business solutions through Glints products.

Requirements Has min. 5 years of working experience in sales and account management Relevant experience in customer-facing success, support, account management, or sales role, is a huge plus point. Proven track record of exceeding or high achievements in individual targets either in sales, account management, or a similar function. Proven past experience of leading a team consist of min. 4 people and achieving high-performance team target Process-driven: high attention to detail, with a process and solution-oriented mindset Comfortable working with early-stage products, i.e. you work well with uncertainty and like taking responsibility. Comfortable talking with the CEO level and dealing with enterprise accounts. Must have a positive attitude Ability to write and speak in English is a must-have. Since we’ve started, we’ve had a clear mission: realizing human potential. We empower people to build their dreams by helping them hire the right people. Also, we help people join the right rocketship that will improve their lives. We have impacted many lives but there’s still plenty to do and we can’t do it alone. Learn more about us by reading our culture deck.

We believe that by bringing everyone together, we can solve problems using innovative technology that can create a world that is sustainable and secure. At NTT, we encourage you to remain continuously curious, as that is what keeps you fast, flexible and relevant. No two days will be the same but that is what will help you grow and realize your full potential. The power is in your hands to do great things. It’s time to lead the change, be the authentic you, to solve difficult challenges, to set the pace of change and to unleash your potential. conducted in strong collaboration with the Platform Architect, covering any development of the platform Take the service schedules & SLAs developed through the value proposition development phase, develop them to contract quality and deliver them for inclusion in the schedules of the master services agreement Drive validation processes by obtaining sign-off from technical, service and financial profiles Understand and influence client operating models Knowledge, skills and attributes Have a broad level of knowledge across Enterprise Architecture, Managed Services, Service Management consulting, and multiple solutions areas (Business Units), and across domains, delivery units, and geographies Ability to develop and execute a Managed Service design approach that results in a consolidated statement of requirements, documented and financially based need for change, role of IT, definition of the AS-IS versus desired state (Future Mode of operation defined), gap analysis and roadmap, highlighted impacts, consequences and benefits of the intended transformation (people, process, platform, technology) Ability to develop and execute a Managed Service design approach that results in a consolidated statement of requirements, documented and financially based need for change, role of IT, definition of the AS-IS versus desired state (Future Mode of operation defined), gap analysis and roadmap, highlighted impacts, consequences and benefits of the intended transformation (people, process, platform, technology) Have a domain level of knowledge in services industry, service delivery models, process improvements, consumption models and multiple MS Portfolio offers and GTM solution areas. Expert in core Managed Service Portfolio offer artifacts, techniques, demos, tools and deliverables Ability to develop a service transformation architecture to deliver the transformation business, investments, activities, deliverables, schedules and risks across all service delivery Academic qualifications and certifications: Tertiary level – bachelor’s with 5 yrs experience; or post-graduate degree with at least 3 years’ experience in a consulting capacity Certification and working knowledge of ITIL, Service Management and Integration Scaled Agile certification Experience required: At least 5 years' experience in a consulting and IT role within a large scale (preferably multi- national) technology services environment A seasoned, experienced professional with a full understanding of area of specialization; resolves a wide range of issues in creative ways. This job is the fully qualified, career-oriented, journey-level position. Proven experience in designing and implementing new delivery models in a significant globally federated delivery organisation A good understanding of the vast range of IT Service Management and operations Significant skills in a wide variety of IT Services, Applications, Networking, Datacentre Communications (including Contact Centre), Security, End-User Computing and Digital Business Solutions Proven client engagement and consulting experience coupled with solid experience in client needs assessment and change management Proven experience in integrating the solution for the project with the business domain, Thorough experience in relevant services and products and understanding of industry best practices Proven sales and client engagement experience What will make you a good fit for the role?Standard career level descriptor for job level:

detailDescription.1403:
Role Purpose

Plan International is an independent development and humanitarian organisation that advances children’s rights and equality for girls. We believe in the power and potential of every child but this is often suppressed by poverty, violence, exclusion and discrimination, and its girls who are most affected. Working together with children, young people, our supporters and partners, we strive for a just world, tackling the root causes of the challenges facing girls and all vulnerable children. We support children’s rights from birth until they reach adulthood and we enable children to prepare for – and respond to – crises and adversity. We drive changes in practice and policy at local, national and global levels using our reach, experience and knowledge. We have been building powerful partnerships for children for over 80 years, and are now active in more than 70 countries.
Yayasan Plan International Indonesia (YPII) is presently implementing its Country Strategy 4 (CS 4) covering fiscal year 2017 to 2022, where the country objective has been defined as “to identify and facilitate the removal of obstacles that prevent children from enjoying their rights and participating fully in Indonesian society”. This goal will be achieved by providing technical support and implementing quality programs and projects through partnership. An effective and efficient communications strategy is a must for Plan Indonesia to share the outcomes of these projects to influence different actors, specially state authorities and to position Plan’s profile within and outside at different levels – starting from community, sub district, district to national, regional and international levels.
Dimensions of the Role

IT Manager has to develop annual IT strategic direction for YPII as an organization in line with Country Strategy 4 and subsequent Country Strategy as well as global IT direction. S/he will take a lead in digitalization project of the organization from conception to implementation that enable YPII to operate more efficiently. S/he will be responsible to manage IT operation in Indonesia and provide IT advice and services to all departments that require digitalization in their process and activities. S/he will coordinate the availability of IT resources and assets for all YPII staff. This position also includes supervisory responsibility on other IT team members. S/he will report to Operation Director and liaise with IT team from Global Hub and Regional Hub as required.

Accountabilities
General Management
Provide strategic advice (conception) and implementation plan for digitalization effort of YPII.
Lead IT project implementation for YPII by bringing all relevant stakeholders to the project and gives regular update to Operation Director and other CMT as needed.
Perform IT operation management in-line with CS4 target and subsequent CS.
Keep abreast of changes in trend and technology especially on the digitalization of operation.
Develop and update IT policies and procedures to ensure that the department operates effectively and reliably.
Keep on the loop of other type of IT and technology usage by other departments.
Perform other related duties as requested by Supervisor.
Digitalization of Organization
Coordinates with Operation Director and CMT on the need for digitalization across organization.
Analyse the existing system and develop plan to migrate from manual based to digital based system that bring more efficiency in operation.
Partner with outside providers and select the best solution available for the organization to adopt and implement.
Budget Management and Monitoring
Prepare accurate annual IT operation budget for YPII on time.
Monitor the cost of IT operation and explanation for budget vs. actual on quarterly basis.
Review and monitor of IT purchase under grant funding to ensure the purchase align with donor requirement.
Maintain list of IT related assets that purchase under sponsorship funding and grant funding.
Develop and manage contacts with external vendors, consultant and IT service providers on behalf of IT.
Coordinate with Logistic to ensure the list is updated on quarterly basis.
Coordinate with Finance to ensure proper depreciation for purchase IT assets on annual basis and when the asset is purchased.
Maintenance of IT infrastructure for offices in Indonesia
Provide best practice models and tools to ensure smooth IT development and operation for YPII.
Supervise and maintain Local Area Network (LAN) whether using Wifi and Ethernet, email access, internet access, proper data.
Ensures all desktop and laptop are updated in term of OS and core applications (i.e. Microsoft Office, Antivirus) on time with minimal disruption to operation.
Ensure proper maintenance for desktop, laptop, UPS, printer, corporate website and other IT related fixed assets in coordination with Logistic.
Ensure the availability and sufficiency of support systems to end-users.
Coordinate with IT global on the SAP access and other Enterprise Resource Planning software
Training End-User
Identify training needs for end users.
Supervise the development of orientation materials for all staff in operate the IT hardware, IT software, and access to the enterprise resource planning software.
Advise field office on hardware and software needs.
Advise other department on hardware and software needs.
Key relationships

Internal

Operation Director: Direct Supervisor

Country Finance Manager: Coordination and collaboration on the implementation and maintenance of ERP software and business intelligence software.

Logistic Procurement Manager: Coordination and collaboration on project implementation related to logistic and procurement digitalization as well as asset related to IT whether purchase by sponsorship fund or grant fund.

Human Resources Manager: Coordination and collaboration on project implementation related to human resource digitalization.

Fundraising team: Coordination and collaboration on project implementation relating with digitalization of face-to-face fundraising, payment system, and donor services as well as system administrator for YPII corporate website.

Influencing and Communication team: Coordination and collaboration on project implementation relating with digitalization of influencing and communication, especially with the use of technology and social media to reach wider target audiences effective and efficient.

Program/Project Manager: Coordination, and collaboration on project usage of technology such as monitoring and evaluation.
External
Global Hub (GH): Coordination on global IT policies and software upgrade that need to be implemented in Indonesia.
External vendors and IT Service Providers: Coordination on daily operation related to IT service provider, monitoring and evaluation of the IT service providers on annual basis.
Technical expertise, skills and knowledge

Essential

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science
At least 4-6 years’ experience at Management level as IT manager.
Analytical thinking and problem solving
Good English speaking and written skills.
Computer software skills, including Microsoft Office, SAP as administrator (prefer), Microsoft Dynamic 365 (prefer), Power BI (prefer).
Experience managing IT infrastructure linking different offices in Indonesia.

Experience In Developing IT Skills For IT Staff.

Desirable
At least 4 years’ relevant post qualification preferably in international organizations, INGOs and/or bilateral organisations.
Good training and coaching abilities
Communication skills, appropriate to the audience
Ability to work in a multidisciplinary and multicultural environment
Strong team-building and motivational skills

Plan International’s Values in Practice
We are open and accountable
We create a climate of trust inside and outside the organization by being open, honest and transparent. We hold ourselves and others to account for the decisions we make and for our impact on others, while doing what we say we will do.
We strive for lasting impact
We strive to achieve significant and lasting impact on the lives of children and young people, and to secure equality for girls. We challenge ourselves to be bold, courageous, responsive, focused and innovative.
We work well together
We succeed by working effectively with others, inside and outside the organisation, including our sponsors and donors. We actively support our colleagues, helping them to achieve their goals. We come together to create and implement solutions in our teams, across Plan International, with children, girls, young people, communities and our partners.
We are inclusive and empowering
We respect all people, appreciate differences and challenge inequality in our programmes and our workplace. We support children, girls and young people to increase their confidence and to change their own lives. We empower our staff to give their best and develop their potential.
Physical Environment
Based at Country Office with at least 30% travel to projects areas, on the field and during humanitarian settings.
Level of contact with children
Low contact: Rare interaction with children

All applications will be treated in confidence. Only short-listed candidates will be notified and invited for interviews. Please submit your letter of application and detailed curriculum vitae in English by apply now not later than March 26 , 2021
Early application is encouraged as we will review applications throughout the advertising period and reserve the right to close the advert early.
A range of pre-employment checks will be undertaken in conformity with Plan International's Safeguarding Children and Young People policy.
As an international child centred community development organisation, Yayasan Plan International Indonesia is fully committed to promoting the realisation of children's rights including their right to protection from violence and abuse. That means we have particular responsibilities to children that we come into contact with.
Yayasan Plan International Indonesia believes that in a world where children face so many threats of harm, it is our duty to ensure that we, as an organisation, do everything we can to keep children safe. We must not contribute in any way to harming or placing children at risk. Equality, diversity and inclusion is at the very heart of everything that Plan International stands for. Our organisation is based on a culture of inclusivity and we strive to create a workplace environment that ensures every team, in every office, in every country, is rich in diverse people, thoughts, and ideas.
We will provide equality of opportunity and will not tolerate discrimination on any grounds. We foster an organisational culture that embraces and exemplifies our commitment to gender equality, girls’ rights and inclusion while supporting staff to adopt good practice, positive attitudes and principles of gender equality and inclusion.

Acquire new accounts and identify new opportunities.
Develop, manage and report pipeline accurately.

Great interpersonal skills, enjoys networking and negotiation.
